name: Minion Warfare
description:
Cute soldiers are ready!

Lovely little soldiers go forward without fear. The goal is to destroy enemies on road. No options to turn back! Just move on!
Cooperate with your paratroopers to surround enemies and destroy their motorbikes and tanks.
Fighting! Little soldiers!

Tips
1. Remember to tap planes pass by sometimes to supplement your soldiers
2. Tap the mine truck to provide a large number of coins
3. Reasonably upgrade your skills to kill enemies
